contents.contents: Keep walking along the ramparts to the Jouy Door. Why not climb the ramparts?
On top of the  impressive Jouy Door there used to be a ridge turret. This is the right place to attend the show of the Ramparts Eagles.

question.contents: Do you know what a ridge turret is?
choices: A small dungeon with a bell

explanations.contents: It is a small donjon with a bell that alerted the population.
